abstract: Editorial praises California for passing country's first comprehensive, statewide cap-and-trade system to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and combat climate change.
snippet: The state unveiled the country’s first statewide cap-and-trade system to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and combat climate change.
lead_paragraph: The state unveiled the country’s first statewide cap-and-trade system to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and combat climate change.

headline.seo: California’s Persistence on Greenhouse Gas Emissions
